com.desc.meetingbooker

Class SettingsActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.desc.meetingbooker.SettingsActivity

  • public final class SettingsActivity
extends Activity
    An activity that reads the config file, and then displays a formula, to edit the config file.

    27-05-2013
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
